attributes.additional_details: Plymouth city council used to clean and maintain it and now its owned by a private development company that wont clean or maintain it.
attributes.background:
To invest in cleaning and maintain devils point tidal pool in Plymouth.
This pool is enjoyed by everyone  babies, toddlers young and old use this pool and not just local people. Would be ashame for it to close the only free pool left, after the city has taken all the free pool away.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. 

You could raise your issue with a local councillor who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:
https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
